Package com.company

Class Product

java.lang.Object
com.company.Product
public class Product
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a product. Each product has a name, category, weight, price and date. LocalDate is used to store the manufacture and expiration date of products. This class generates the product's information both in String format and json.
Since:
4/15/2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
KIMIA

  • Constructor Details

    • Product

      public Product​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String category, double weight, double price, java.time.LocalDate manufactureDate, java.time.LocalDate expirationDate)
      This is the constructor of Product. The constructor checks if the given numbers, (price and weight) are positive numbers. It also checks whether the expiration date is after manufacture date or not.
      Parameters:
      name - the product's name
      category - the category in which the product belongs to
      weight - the product's weight
      price - the product's price
      manufactureDate - the date in which the product was made
      expirationDate - the date in which the product is going to expire

    • toJsonObject

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject toJsonObject()
      This method converts all the product's field into json object and return the object. json-simple-1.1 is used here to create json objects.
      Returns:
      the json format of the product
